oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from W. H. Lipscomb written during the Vicksburg campaign
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter written by W. H. Lipscomb to his father on beautiful Centenary College of Louisiana (Jackson, LA) letterhead. Written during the Vicksburg campaign, Lipscomb describes conditions in the Confederate ranks and a recent fight between forces of Brig. Gen. Henry H. Sibley CSA and those of Maj. Gen. Nathaniel P. Banks USA. There is a typed transcription of the letter.
